name: BestBuzz
tag_list: mobile-marketing, qr-codes, software, saas, mobile, apps, rewards, social-media, startups, nfc, ar, ir, qr, sms, barcode, scan, scanner, iphone, android, blackberry, windows
overview:
Our mission is to build the best mobile marketing suite of tools, so that brands can easily leverage power of mobile and reach of social to generate viral buzz from their customers.

BestBuzz is a mobile application and marketing software platform that combines the power of mobile with the reach of social to generate viral buzz. The cloud-based BestBuzz dashboard allows brands to generate word-of-mouth marketing through social media, while engaging with their loyal customers at the point-of-sale to offer dynamic and geo-targeted rewards.

BestBuzz is a mobile-play which leverages QR codes, SMS marketing, NFC technology, big data, and a multi-platform mobile application, so that a few customer scans can create thousands of high-quality, trusted impressions for the brand and generate clicks from new customers. BestBuzz’s patent-pending solutions provide new ways for brands to control and manage their message, maintain data integrity, and track and measure campaign ROI from a single dashboard.
